title: Anxiolytic effect of an extract of Salvia miltiorrhiza Bunge (Danshen) in mice.
abstract: Salvia miltiorrhiza Bunge (Danshen), a traditional Chinese medicine, has demonstrated in modern studies for its pharmacological activities in treatments of CNS disorders like insomnia, dysphoria. However, its application on anxiolytic effect from the ethanol extract of Salvia miltiorrhiza Bunge (SM<sub>EtOH</sub>) has not yet been reported.
